product_name: Hugger Mugger Tapas Nature Collection Yoga Mat
long_description: Enjoy your yoga practice with the Hugger Mugger Nature Collection yoga mat. PVC material provides great traction so you can go deep into poses; does not contain latex, phthalates or heavy metals. Your yoga classmates will be envious of the attractive colorful pattern that was inspired by nature. Antimicrobial properties are built-in to help control odors; wash mat by hand with mild dish soap and water. Hugger Mugger Nature Collection mat rolls up compactly for easy transport.
short_description: Enjoy your yoga practice with the Hugger Mugger Nature Collection yoga mat.
